category.name: Product Structure.Variant Administration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PersistFullyExpandedSVR
preference.preference_description: Activates the capture of all the values of a Variant Rule (which includes Default, Derived Default) when setting a Saved Variant Rule (creation or update). This is required if the Saved Variant Rule is used in Active Workspace BOM Indexing generation. Valid Values: * true: all values are captured. * false: only user set values are captured in a Saved Variant Rule during creation or update. This is the default value.
